Subject: Science
ContentDescription: Recognise that materials can be changed physically without changing their material composition, and explore the effect of different actions on materials, including bending, twisting, stretching and breaking into smaller pieces

Subject: Science
ContentDescription: Recognise that materials can be changed physically without changing their material composition, and explore the effect of different actions on materials, including bending, twisting, stretching and breaking into smaller pieces

ContentDescription: Recognise that materials can be changed physically without changing their material composition, and explore the effect of different actions on materials, including bending, twisting, stretching and breaking into smaller pieces

Subject: Science
